snippet: The drug is the second one brought to market by Vertex and could be effective for more patients than the first drug, Kalydeco.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves Orkambi, new cystic fibrosis treatment developed by Vertex Pharmaceuticals; approval is expected to make Vertex consistently profitable for the first time.
lead_paragraph: The drug is the second one brought to market by Vertex and could be effective for more patients than the first drug, Kalydeco.

headline.main: Orkambi, a New Cystic Fibrosis Drug, Wins F.D.A. Approval
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves New Drug for the Treatment of Cystic Fibrosis
